longBusinessSummary: Zamp S.A. engages in the developing, operating, and franchising restaurants under the Burger King and Popeyes brand names in Brazil. It also provides advisory and support services to Burger King restaurants, as well as sells, imports, and exports related products. The company was formerly known as BK Brasil Operação e Assessoria a Restaurantes S.A. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Barueri, Brazil.
